title: Diverse Trees Protect the World
summary: Through a story of diverse trees learning to understand one another and live together, children discover the importance of biodiversity, cooperation, and caring for the Earth.

texts: Look at the Earth! There are special trees, full of personality just like you, living in the world. They all start from a tiny seed of life.
Some trees have leaves that are yellow and beautiful. "Only if it's colorful like me can everyone be happy!"
Another tree is neatly dressed in square, light green leaves. "Only if it's clean and proper like me can we make a clean Earth!"
This tree is covered entirely in strong, vibrant colors. "Only with my strength can we protect the Earth strongly!"
The neighboring tree looks free. "We have no fixed shape! This world should be fun and free!"
But a problem soon arose. They started arguing, "Only my way is the best!" Then, the trees seemed to wilt, and the Earth's colors began to fade.
When only the trees were left, they also seemed to gradually become sick.
It turns out, everyone was needed in this world! The strong trees bore more fruit,
and the small trees quietly protected the soil's nutrients.
Trees and flowers often help each other.
Together, they can bloom stronger and more beautiful flowers.
Strong trees, quiet trees, colorful trees... The special strength everyone has must combine for our Earth to breathe healthily.
Not just trees, but butterflies, birds, fish... All these lives must live together for our world to be more beautiful.
When we all protect this precious diversity of life and respect the unique personalities of different trees...
Our world will become healthy and abundant!

preQuestions.question: What kinds of trees appear in this story, and how do they help protect the Earth?

postQuestions.question: Why do different trees and living creatures need to live together on Earth?

missions.title: Draw Tree Diversity
missions.description: Find trees around you with different shapes and colors. Draw them and write down what makes each tree unique.

vocabulary.definition: A state of having many different forms or kinds.
Working together with others to achieve a common goal.
A state of being full, rich, and plentiful.
The energy or state that makes living things alive.
